title: Cash Course: The Right Way To Save Money

Itâ€™s never too early to start saving money and making fiscally responsible decisions that will last a lifetime. In this episode, middle and high school students will learn why they should save, the purpose of opening a savings account, and how they can save for their futures.

Cash Course is a fun and educational show highlighting the importance of money management and financial literacy for grades 6+.
